cards.title: The Ram
setup: At the start of the game, put {TheRam}'s villain character cards into play, “Mechanical Juggernaut” side up. Search the villain deck for all copies of Up Close and put them in the trash. Put Grappling Claw into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever all active heroes are Up Close, flip {TheRam}'s character cards and destroy all copies of Fall Back,
At the start of a hero's turn, if that hero is not Up Close, you may take a copy of Up close from the villain trash and play it next to that hero.
Reduce damage dealt to {TheRam} by 1. Increase damage dealt to {TheRam} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} melee damage.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt to Up Close heroes by 1.
flippedGameplay: When {TheRam}'s character cards are flipped to this side, search the villain trash for Grappling claw and put it into play.
If a copy of Close Up attached to a hero leaves play, flip {TheRam}'s character cards.
Increase damage dealt to {TheRam} by hero targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {TheRam} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} melee damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Whenever a villain target is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: Barrier Buster
cards.body: Destroy all environment cards. {TheRam} deals each non-villain target X melee damage, where X = 3 plus the number of cards destroyed this way.

cards.title: Fall Back
body: When this card enters play, {TheRam} deals each Up Close hero target {H - 1} melee damage. Destroy all copies of Up Close in play.
{TheRam} is immune to damage from heroes that are not Up Close.

cards.title: Falling Meteor
cards.body: Search the villain deck and trash for {H - 2} copies of Up Close and play them next to the {H - 2} heroes with the highest HP that are not up close. If you searched the deck, shuffle it. {TheRam} deals each non-villain target {H} projectile damage.

cards.title: Forcefield Node
body: This card is immune to damage from heroes that are not Up Close.
Whenever a copy of Up Close enters play next to a hero, this card deals that hero {H - 2} energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Get in close! That{BR}field is permeable to low-{BR}velocity objects.

cards.title: Grappling Claw
body: At the end of the villain turn, {TheRam} deals {H - 2} projectile damage to the hero with the lowest HP that is not Up Close. Put a copy of Up Close from the villain trash into play next to that hero.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't think he wants to shake{BR}hands.

cards.title: Personal Defense Spines
cards.body: {TheRam} deals each Up Close hero target {H + 2} melee damage. Destroy all ongoing and equipment cards belonging to those heroes. {TheRam} deals each other hero target 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Ok, engaging it at point-blank range{BR}is suicide.

cards.title: Power Node
body: This card is immune to damage from heroes that are not Up Close.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck, and all Devices and Nodes regain 1HP.

cards.title: Recharge Circuits
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, if no heroes are Up Close, {TheRam} regains 10HP and all Devices and Nodes regain 2HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Halberd-19's regenerative{BR}powers warrant the capability to wage{BR}a war of attrition.

cards.title: Remote Mortar
body: This card is immune to damage from heroes that are Up Close.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each Up Close hero {H - 1} energy damage and those heroes must each discard a card.

flavorQuotes.text: R43 can ballistically deploy mortar{BR}defenses to cover its flanks.

cards.title: Rocket Pod
body: This card is immune to damage from heroes that are not Up Close.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero that is not Up Close {H - 2} cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Morphology of target Halberd-19 is{BR}unstable//cryogenic rockets//deploy.

cards.title: Up Close
body: When this card enters play, if all active heroes are Up Close, this card is destroyed.
Play this card next to an active hero who is not Up Close. That hero and all their targets are Up Close. That hero gains:

promoCards.title: The Ram
setup: At the start of the game, put {TheRam} and {AdmiralWinters}' villain character cards into play, “Amphibious Dreadnought” and “Dreadnought Pilot” sides up. Search the villain deck for all copies of Up Close and put them in the trash. Put 2 copies of Remote Mortar into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: If {TheRam} is destroyed remove this card from the game.
Whenever a villain one-shot would enter play, put it beneath this card instard. Cards beneath this one are not considered in play.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are 3 or more cards beneath this one, flip {TheRam}'s character cards.
flippedGameplay: If {TheRam} is destroyed remove this card from the game.
When {TheRam} flips to this side, it regains {H + 2} HP. Then, put all cards beneath this one into play in any order.
At the start of the villain turn, if {TheRam} did not flip this turn, flip {TheRam}'s villain character cards.
Increase projectile damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.

promoCards.title: The Ram
gameplay: The heroes cannot win the game. If {AdmiralWinters} would be destroyed, flip his character cards instead.
At the start of a hero's turn, if that hero is not Up Close, you may take a copy of Up close from the villain trash and play it next to that hero.
{AdmiralWinters} is immune to damage from targets that are not up close. The first time {AdmiralWinters} would be dealt damage each turn, redirect that damage to {TheRam}.

At the end of the villain turn, {AdmiralWinters} deals {H} projectile damage to each hero that is not up close. Then, play the top X cards of the villain deck, where X is the number of copies of Up Close in play minus 1.
flippedGameplay: At the start of a hero's turn, if that hero is not Up Close, you may take a copy of Up close from the villain trash and play it next to that hero.
Increase damage dealt to and by {TheRam} by 1.
Whenever a one-shot is placed under {TheRam}'s character cards, immediately flip {TheRam}'s character cards.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
